problem_text_cn: 如图,一圆柱高为8cm,底面周长为30cm,蚂蚁在圆柱表面爬行,从点A爬到点B的最短路程是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the height of a cylinder is N_0, the perimeter of the bottom surface is N_1, and the ants are crawling on the surface of the cylinder. The shortest distance from point A to point B is ()
raw_answer: 如图所示:沿过A点和过B点的母线剪开,展成平面,连接AB则AB的长是蚂蚁在圆柱表面从A点爬到B点的最短路程,AC=\frac{1}{2}x×30=15(cm),∠C=90°,BC=8cm由勾股定理得:AB=√{AC²+BC²}=17(cm)故选B.
